componentAttributes.labelThankYou: Thank you for your interest in applying to Climate Corps. Please fill out the information below.
componentAttributes.pillNames: Dashboard | Contact | Education | Background | Preferences | Cover Letter

componentAttributes.headingExperienceInfo: Please indicate your level of experience (None, Basic, Moderate, and Advanced) with the following project types.
componentAttributes.helpTextUploadedIdentification: The following set of documents can be uploaded - (1) Voter Id (2) Aadhaar (3) Passport (4) Driver's License (5) Attested/Official College Id (with the dates of joining and ending mentioned)
componentAttributes.labelNativeEnglishSpeaker: English proficiency is required for this position. Are you fluent or proficient in English?
componentAttributes.labelPassport: Please check the box if you have a passport
componentAttributes.labelUploadedIdentificationNote: Please upload a copy of your India ID
componentAttributes.labelYearsOfExperience: How many years of professional work experience do you have?
